case.title: Asian Girl Looking for Laidback White Guy - 28 (CT/NYC)
case.text:
Long story short, I'm an Asian female looking for a laidback guy to date in hopes of a long term relationship. I currently live in CT and commute into NYC for work. Yeah, I know this is Craigslist so that might be asking for a lot. In theory, if you can find your apt and sell some concert tickets on here, why can't Craigslist find you a boyfriend or girlfriend or at least someone to date and see where it goes?
Me: Chinese 5'8 28 Bachelor's Degree Enjoys traveling, reading, working out, going out, watching/playing sports
You: 5'8 or taller White Late 20s or early 30s in Age At least a Bachelor's Degree
Please send me a pic and what you're looking for in a woman.
